summary: Harald Edelstam uses his position as Sweden's ambassador to Chile to save political dissidents from persecution by the military junta after Augusto Pinochet's 1973 coup d'état.
cast: Michael Nyqvist|Lumi Cavazos|Kate del Castillo|Lisa Werlinder|Carsten Norgaard|Cristián Campos|Patrick Bergin|Daniel Giménez Cacho|Luis Gnecco|Ramón Núñez|Rolando Garza|Gabriela Aguilera|Amanda Borgnon|Trinidad González|Pedro Vicuña|Carlos Morales|José Ignacio García|Edgardo Bruna|Sergio Madrid|Alvaro Uccelletti|Lasse Lunderskov|Claire Ross-Brown|Beatriz Doizi|Ramón González|Eduardo Paxeco|Francisco González|Jaime McManus|Lía Maldonado|Luis Corvalán|María E. title: The Black Pimpernel
